member.name: M:RGN.Modules.UserProfile.UserProfileModule.GetProfileAsync
member.summary: Returns user data for current authenticated user.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.UserProfile.UserProfileModule.GetProfileAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Returns user data for provided user id. The base data contains some basic user info In case you want to request more information (like user coins) please use the method
member.param: User Id to get the data

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.UserProfile.UserProfileModule.GetFullUserProfileAsync``1
member.summary: Returns user full profile data for current authenticated user. The data contains user coins currencies information. You can use the as the generic parameter or implement your own serializable class to store additional data.
member.param: User Id to get the data
member.returns: A generic TFullProfileData class contaning user's full profile for the userId specified.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.UserProfile.UserProfileModule.GetFullUserProfileAsync``1(System.String)
member.summary: Returns user full profile data for provided user id. The data contains user coins currencies information. You can use the as the generic parameter or implement your own serializable class to store additional data.
member.param: User Id to get the data
member.returns: A generic TFullProfileData class contaning user's full profile for the userId specified.
